text: Henryk Bohdan Samsonowicz (January 23, 1930 - May 28, 2021) was a Polish historian. He was known for his knowledge in medieval Poland. He was also a writer, and professor of the University of Warsaw. From 1989 through 1990, he was the minister of education in the government of prime minister Tadeusz Mazowiecki.Henryk Samsonowicz, biography at the webpage of Department of History of Warsaw University. Instytut Historyczny UW, 15 June 2009. He was elected a member of the Academia Europaea in 1990. Samsonowicz died on May 28, 2021 in Warsaw at the age of 91.Nie Å¼yje prof.
